casebody.data:
Thursday, January 2, 1997

MOTION DOCKET

96-2282. State v. Keaton.

Fayette App. Nos. CA95-09-021 and CA95-09-022. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal and claimed appeal of right. Upon consideration of appellants’ motion for stay of execution of sentence and continuation of bail,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for stay of execution of sentence and continuation of bail be, and hereby is, denied.

Moyer, C.J., and Cook, J., dissent and would grant the motion and continue bond.
